content: after many requests i have created a crochet rose granny square pattern for you the perfect mix between crochet and flowers to make the flower pop from the granny square i have created a 3d design ensuring the queen of all the flowers is standing proud you can use this granny square on a huge range of projects from blankets clothing or scarves materials 10 meters of coloured dk yarn for your rose i have used circiulo amigurumi yarn in pink 3 meters of green dk yarn 5 meters of cream dk yarn matching crochet hook to your yarn i have used a 3 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors gauge 19dc stitches x 10 row for a 10 x 10cm square size 10 x 10cm per granny square notes the granny square is worked in the round the rose is worked using front and back loops
